sentences.en: "I'll see you in the morning," Hugh said coldly.
A Delta II rocket was launched from Cape Canaveral early this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天一早，一枚“德尔塔”Ⅱ型火箭在卡纳维拉尔角发射升空。

sentences.en: After a fruitless morning sitting at his desk he had given up.
sentences.cn: 他在书桌前徒劳地坐了一上午之后便放弃了。

sentences.en: Captain David Clement and 150 commandos stormed the port this morning.
sentences.cn: 戴维·克莱门特上尉和150名突击队员今天早上对港口展开突袭。

sentences.en: He felt strangely exhilarated by the brisk, blue morning.
sentences.cn: 那个凉爽而晴朗的早晨让他异常兴奋。

sentences.en: He stayed in bed late on Sunday morning.
sentences.cn: 星期日早上他睡到很晚。

sentences.en: He's been in a stew since early this morning.
sentences.cn: 他从今天一大早就焦虑不安。

sentences.en: I hated those cold winter mornings.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌冬天里寒冷的早晨。

sentences.en: I managed to get all the ironing done this morning.
sentences.cn: 我今天上午努力熨完了所有的衣服。

sentences.en: I reached Kilmarnock in the early morning in drenching rain.
sentences.cn: 我一大早就冒着瓢泼大雨到了基尔曼诺克。

sentences.en: I’m not feeling very well this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天早上我觉得不大舒服。

sentences.en: On the morning before starting the fast, write down your starting weight.
sentences.cn: 早晨开始禁食前，记下你的体重。

sentences.en: She took the early morning train.
sentences.cn: 她搭乘了一大早的火车。

sentences.en: The party had been to the grouse moors that morning.
sentences.cn: 这群人那天上午去了松鸡猎场。

sentences.en: The weather was unkind to those pipers who played in the morning.
sentences.cn: 坏天气对上午那些风笛吹奏者毫不容情。

sentences.en: They have to get up early in the morning.
They're freshly baked. I fetched them from the baker's this morning.
sentences.cn: 它们是刚出炉的。我早上去面包房买回来的。

sentences.en: This morning he had tried every way possible to contact her.
sentences.cn: 他今天早晨已想尽办法与她联系。

sentences.en: This morning, looking harassed and drawn, Lewis tendered his resignation.
sentences.cn: 今天早晨，刘易斯面色憔悴、疲惫不堪地递交了辞呈。

phrases.tran_cn: 凌晨之后；宿醉，酒醉后的影响
孕妇晨吐；孕妇怀孕初期的反应
(幽默)（夜晚狂饮后仍未醒酒的）次日早上

trans.tran_cn: 早晨，上午，黎明，早期，初期
trans.tran_en: the early part of the day, from when the sun rises until 12 o’clock in the middle of the day
